import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; /* ---------- Inline Styles ---------- */ const styles = { homepageWrapper: { fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif' }, heroSection: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)', height: '90vh', color: '#fff', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', }, overlay: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', width: '100%', padding: '4rem', boxSizing: 'border-box', }, content: { maxWidth: 600 }, title: { fontSize: '3rem', fontWeight: 'bold', margin: 0 }, subtitle: { fontSize: '1.2rem', margin: '1rem 0 0' }, buttons: { marginTop: '2rem' }, btn: { padding: '0.8rem 2rem', marginRight: '1rem', backgroundColor: '#ff4d4f', color: '#fff', textDecoration: 'none', borderRadius: 8, fontSize: '1rem', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease', }, introSection: { padding: '4rem 2rem', textAlign: 'center' }, introText: { maxWidth: 800, margin: '1rem auto', fontSize: '1.1rem', lineHeight: 1.6, color: '#333', }, }; /* ---------- Component ---------- */ const HomePage = () => (
{/* Hero */}

Inspiration and Innovation.

CampusLink is your centralized hub for student utilities. From announcements to complaint tracking, everything you need is one click away.

Login Register
{/* Intro */}

A Few Words About CampusLink

CampusLink simplifies campus life by centralizing critical utilities like class schedules, announcements, lost & found, and hostel complaints. It empowers students and eases the admin workload.

); export default HomePage;
